# [Interview #972: AMOL Signing Report - JaimieKrycho, Entry #28](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=972#28)

#### Question

Do we see a full grown Jumara in the encyclopedia or anywhere else?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
